briefTitle: An Open-label, 8-week Safety, Efficacy, and Assessment of Cooling Methods for Administration of CNTX-4975-05 for Knee OA
officialTitle: An Open-label, 8-Week Study to Compare the Comfort and Ease of Use of Five Different Treatment Regimens for CNTX-4975-05 Intra-articular Injection in Subjects With Chronic, Moderate-to-Severe Osteoarthritis Knee Pain

arms.label: Single Needle Injection Gel Pack Cooling Group - 2% Lidocaine
Single Needle Injection Gel Pack Cooling Group - 1% Lidocaine

summary: An Open-label, 8-Week Study to Compare the Comfort and Ease of Use of Five Different Treatment Regimens for CNTX 4975-05 Intra-articular Injection in Subjects with Chronic, Moderate-to-Severe Osteoarthritis Knee Pain.

primaryOutcome.measure: Determination of Optimal Procedure for Administering CNTX-4975-05 With Regards to Pain, Participant Satisfaction, and Investigator's Satisfaction

effectByArm.arm: Group 4. Single Needle Injection Gel Pack Cooling - 2% Lidocaine
Group 5. Single Needle Injection Gel Pack Cooling - 1% Lidocaine
